import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; class flightItem extends Component { render() { var { flight } = this.props; var myObj = $.parseJSON(`{"date_created":"${flight.ngayGio}"}`), myDate = new Date(1000*myObj.date_created); return (
{/* */} {this.showImgHangBay(flight.hangVe)} {flight.hangVe}

17.00

{flight.codeSanDi}
{myDate.toLocaleString()}

22.20

{flight.codeSanDen}

{flight.donGiaPT} VND

không hoàn tiền
đặt vé ngay
); } showImgHangBay = (hangBay) => { if(hangBay === "VietJetAirline") { return } else if(hangBay === "BambooAirline") { return } else { return } } } export default flightItem;
